title: I was eating at a restaurant, three hungry 5 year old came to me asking for food.
body:
even if I gave them 10 dollars they will just be replaced by a bunch of other children, whoever told me visiting in a 3rd world country was a fun idea, go to Hell!!

on the plus side, the cost of Elemental Lux skin is actually a lot of money. you could actually live like a rich person, however that's also a problem. in a place where people are so poor, even a child needs to work for food, you are basically god. and you can break your soul by doing things you should never do..

all this talk about making America great again, and fighting over stupid ass money problems. we got food to give, we can stop any war in less than a few hours. yet no one does anything, people care only about their families and screw the rest.

I have lost faith in humanity..

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/wkd2BSA8ioI/maxresdefault.jpg
